section.heading: Application of Fish and Wildlife Law

content.p:
ยง 11-0107. Application of Fish and Wildlife Law.
 1. No person shall, at any time of the year, pursue, take, wound or
kill in any manner, number or quantity, any fish protected by law, game,
protected wildlife, shellfish, harbor seals, crustacea protected by law,
or protected insects, except as permitted by the Fish and Wildlife Law.
 2. No person shall, at any time of the year, buy, sell, offer or
expose for sale, transport, or have in his possession any fish protected
by law, game, protected wildlife, shellfish, harbor seals, crustacea
protected by law, or part thereof, or protected insect, whether taken
within the state or coming from without the state, except as permitted
by the Fish and Wildlife Law.
